definition: to press/to push/to leave aside or shelve/to control/to restrain/to keep one's hand on/to check or refer to/according to/in the light of/(of an editor or author) to make a comment
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

sentences.english: These men and women grew up with faith in an America wherehard work and responsibility paid off.
sentences.chinese: 这些人民是在美国按劳分配的信念下成长起来。

sentences.english: Narrowing Income Gap by Reforming Income Distribution System;
sentences.chinese: 按劳分配是收入分配的主要原则。

sentences.english: The personal income puts the principle distributing according to one's performance into practice.
sentences.chinese: 社会主义社会，个人收入实行按劳分配的原则。

sentences.english: Labor-based distribution lacks fraternity while capital-based distribution has more fancy.
sentences.chinese: 按劳分配缺乏博爱精神，差别原则多有空想成分。

sentences.english: Marxist theory on labour values has no tuner relations with means of distribution according to work.
sentences.chinese: 马克思的劳动价值论与按劳分配没有内在联系。

sentences.english: Distribution according to work is one of the principles of socialism.
sentences.chinese: “按劳分配”是社会主义的一条重要原则。

definition: ownership of the means of production (in Marxism)/system of ownership
piece rate wage/remuneration based on one's output/opposite: time rate wage 計時工資|计时工资[ji4 shi2 gong1 zi1]
relations between levels of production/socio-economic relations
lit. to eat from the common pot (idiom)/fig. to be rewarded the same, regardless of performance
meal cooked in a large pot/communal meal/(fig.) system that rewards everyone equally regardless of merit
"land to the tiller", post-Liberation land reform movement instigated by the CCP
